t: List of Amazon brands - Wikipedia
s: November 26, 2024 - Amazon offers multiple lines of privately labeled products. These are available on Amazon.com, Amazon Fresh, Prime Pantry, Prime Now, Amazon Go, and Whole Foods Market. Amazon houses its in-house brand offerings under the “Our Brands” label, which is separate from exclusive brands.

t: Who can create a Brand Store?
How Wide Distribution Impacts Your Brand on Amazon
s: Brands are incentivized to set up many points of distribution (big box, wholesale, specialty, boutique, distributor, et al.) in order to maximize revenue. But wide distribution offline causes challenges on Amazon and could lead to price erosion and unhealthy ecommerce marketplace competition.

t: Amazon Distribution: Brand Choices (or Lack Thereof) | The Daily | Gartner L2
s: L2’s latest Intelligence Report on Amazon shows brands have little choice on whether and how widely they are sold on the retail platform. In fact, those not officially selling through Amazon were distributed more widely ...

t: Brand Stores: Create a brand page on Amazon for free | Amazon Ads

t: CPSC Warns Consumers to Immediately Stop Using VESLA HOME Brand Kitchen Faucets Sold on Amazon.com Due to Dangerous Lead Exposure for Young Children | CPSC.gov

t: Amazon is dropping dozens of in-house brands you didn’t even know it owned | The Verge
